refactor.do: Explain any specific code improvement that you are looking for, such as, performance, readability, etc. Otherwise, drop your code snippet for a general assessment.
refactor.dont: Avoid sending code that isn't related to the issue. Refrain from submitting lengthy code. Type 'Disclaimer' to the chat for limitations.

explain.do: Ask a coding-related questions for an explanation or provide a code snippet to get a concise explanation.
explain.dont: Overly general questions get overly general responses so be concise but specific!

debug.do: Briefly explain the problem, provide any error messages and state the language.
debug.dont: Avoid sending code that isn't related to the issue. Refrain from submitting lengthy code. Type 'Disclaimer' to the chat for limitations.

convert.do: Clearly state the language you would like your code snippet converted into. Provide context if necessary to how the code operates.
convert.dont: Refrain from submitting overly complex and lengthy code snippets. Run the code through the 'Debug' option before submitting to ensure that the snippet doesn't convert with any pre-existing bugs.
